job.title: Software Engineer
job.description:
We are looking for an innovative software engineer to help us build the future!


This position will:

• Create new features and fix bugs

• Collaborate with the product owner and other developers

• Operate with minimal oversight to develop code the matches provided requirements


The preferred candidate has:

• Desire to contribute energy to building great technology solutions

• Entrepreneurial, collaborative spirit needed to work in a distributed startup culture

• Practical experience designing scalable applications for web and/or mobile

• Effective verbal, written communication skills

• Experience with Angular, Node, and MongoDB required


This is not an entry-level position - you need to be able to hit the ground running.

However, capabilities are far more important than credentials.


This is a full-time (W-2), 100% remote position.

Candidates in Florida, Ohio, or Utah are preferred.

Private Auto LLC offers employees medical and dental insurance.

Candidates must be legally authorized to work in the US. No visa sponsorships.
